projects.name: OpsMind
projects.title: OpsMind – AI-Powered Operations & Workflow Intelligence
projects.description: Built an AI-powered internal operations assistant that acts as an intelligence layer over daily workflows. OpsMind analyzes tasks, tickets, and updates to provide operational clarity, detect bottlenecks, suggest priorities, and generate SOPs for startups, agencies, and remote teams.
details: Automated analysis of tasks, tickets, and internal updates
Daily and weekly operational summaries for founders and managers
SOP generation from repeated operational workflows
Natural language Q&A over internal company data

projects.name: ConversAI
projects.title: ConversAI – AI-Powered Voice Automation Assistant
projects.description: Built an AI-powered voice automation system capable of handling real-time phone conversations, understanding user intent, triggering backend workflows, and integrating with CRMs and email systems. Designed to help businesses scale communication without increasing human support staff.
details: Real-time inbound call handling with natural voice conversations
Intent understanding and context-aware dialogue using GPT
Backend function calling and workflow automation
Automated email notifications and appointment booking

projects.name: BuyBlend
projects.title: BuyBlend – Ethical Handcrafted Jewelry E-commerce
projects.description: An online e-commerce platform offering ethically handcrafted jewelry including gold plated earrings, oxidized pendants, rings, and combo collections with sustainable packaging and free delivery options. Based in Indore, India. :contentReference[oaicite:1]{index=1}
details: Ethically sourced materials and sustainable practices
Free delivery over minimum order value
Curated collections with modern and traditional designs

projects.name: Best Rudraksha - Sacred Beads Store
projects.title: Best Rudraksha - Sacred Beads Store
projects.description: Premium spiritual e-commerce platform for authentic, lab-certified Rudraksha beads and malas, designed to help users easily discover, verify, and purchase the right Rudraksha for their spiritual and astrological needs

projects.name: MindSync AI
projects.title: MindSync AI – Workflow Support Tool for Therapists & Counselors
projects.description: Developed a privacy-first AI tool for mental health professionals that summarizes session notes, tracks progress, and flags potential risk markers—without providing medical diagnosis. Built for scalability and compliance, this LLM-powered assistant streamlines therapist workflows and integrates easily into existing practice tools.
details: Ready for integration with platforms like Athena, PracticeBetter, and SimplePractice
